title: FPS Skipping
body:
Recently, I logged in to start my 2018 placement matches, and like a fool I didn't go into the practice tool first - thinking, perhaps naively, that I would be fine.

I was wrong.

Immediately, I knew something was wrong when my game was reading 12 FPS.  "Huh," I thought to myself.  "That's weird, my computer usually gives me nearly 250FPS!"  And I assumed it was a client error, so I restarted.  

No such luck.

The game was a nightmare; the framerates weren't low, they were _skipping_.  I was bouncing from 13, to 80, to 10, to 25, to 17, to 182, you name it.  The worst part of this was that these skips were sporadic, lacked a discernible pattern, and were completely unaffected by _any_ change I made.  I attempted to lower my graphics, tweak movement prediction on, then off, shift my V-Sync, implement a frame cap, _nothing has worked_.  There is not a single setting I have not tampered with, tweaked, or otherwise changed.  _Nothing has worked_.  I have now lost my first preseason placement game, which isn't too horrible, except now I'm guaranteed a net loss even if I win the next 9.

I want a resolution.  I _demand_ a resolution.  I've poured hundreds, if not thousands of dollars into this game over the years.  I've found not a _shred_ of help in _any_ of the official resources, and I'm at my wit's end.  XBOX Game DVR is not the issue, and I have neither Flux or F.Lux, so those don't appear to be problems either.  Fix this, please, Riot.

It's also worth noting that, prior to the 2018 Preseason, this issue never happened to me.

replies.body:
Hmm sounds like you're experiencing the dreaded fps drops on high end machines if you nnormally run at 250. This is the current status of the issue:
https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/GlIAFKNQ-fps-drops-data-gathering

However it's also possible your issues are unrelated, in which case I'd recommend running through the possible solutions found here in the meantime:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting
While I appreciate that help, Seras, neither of those have offered any level of insight or improvement.

If the fixes in the second link didn't help you then unfortunately you're likely stuck with the situation detailed in the first one, for which there isn't currently a fix. It's a global issue, and is being worked on, but there is no ETA on a resolution. Any updates will be posted on that first link so it's worth keeping an eye on.

If you want more help you can submit a ticket to player support, but I can't help you any further I don't know enough about it.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
